name: Admit/Visit Notification
description: Patient admission notification in HL7 v2.3
businessPurpose: Notify receiving applications that a patient has been admitted for inpatient care or has begun a visit for outpatient care
timing: Sent when patient registration is complete and bed assignment occurs

vendorVariations.epic: Often includes additional OBX segments for patient characteristics
vendorVariations.cerner: May include custom Z-segments for facility-specific data

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - core patient demographics must be complete
